analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba /

analyzed: bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thugs rje rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gsal ba /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhin rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam stegs su shar ba /

translated: releasing,🔽drawing out, paralyzing,🔽stupefying,🔽kissing,🔽eating,🔽drinking,🔽licking,🔽destroying,🔽killing,🔽suppressing,🔽

translated: The activities of giving, releasing, drawing, paralyzing, stupefying, binding, eating, drinking, sucking, destroying, killing, suppressing, exorcising, defeat, victory, and so on were performed, and they all took their seats in the row of the secret vajra.

analyzed: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////

original: de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas /
analyzed: de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas /

translated: the realms of the hells, pretas, animals, humans, demigods, and gods; the individual realms of the four concentrations, four immeasurables, and formless realm; the realms of the tirthikas,

analyzed: de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas /

translated: Then, with his eyes of miraculous power, he looked at the stages of the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas, the abodes of the knowledge holders, and all the buddhas of the ten directions and four times. original: rnam par mi mdzad /

original: mdzad pa mi 'gog /
analyzed: mdzad pa mi 'gog /
translated: He did not stop acting.🔽He did not act without acting.

analyzed: mdzad pa rnam par yang mi 'gog mi mdzad pa'ang mi gnas /
translated: He did not remain silent.

analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snod kyi khams thams cad dang / sa'i khyad par thams cad la'ang mi gzigs /

analyzed: mi @427b dgengs /

analyzed: gzigs shing dgongs pa la'ang mi 'gog /

original: rnam par yang mi 'gog /
analyzed: rnam par yang mi 'gog /

original: mi 'gog pa la'ang mi gnas so //
analyzed: mi 'gog pa la'ang mi gnas so //

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang / snod kyi khams de dag dang / bcud kyi khams de dag dang / sa'i khyad par de dag thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid tsam du dmigs su med do //

translated: Then, as soon as he entered into meditative absorption, all of those maṇḍalas of the retinue, those realms of the world, those realms of the inhabitants, and those particularities of the earth were not perceived as being merely the characteristics of illusion.

original: dper na / nam mkha' ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su'ang song la /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su'ang song la /
translated: For example, just as space pervades all phenomena

analyzed: ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdags su med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems de'ang chos thams cad la'ang khyab la /

original: smra bsam las kyang 'das so //
analyzed: smra bsam las kyang 'das so //

analyzed: de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bor brjod du med pa la brnal bzhin du yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa'i kro dhi'i rgyal mos stong nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo //
translated: In that way, while remaining in the inexpressible essence of the dharmakāya, the mother Samantabhadrī, the queen of wrathful ones, implored him with this song from within emptiness.

original: aom/ snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku //
analyzed: aom/ snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku //
translated: The empty appearance, the empty vajra, is the dharmakāya.

original: smra bsam las 'das don dam byang chub sems //
analyzed: smra bsam las 'das don dam byang chub sems //
translated: The ultimate bodhicitta is beyond speech and thought.

original: stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis //
analyzed: stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis //
translated: By the commitment not to depart from the state of emptiness,

analyzed: snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gsol //

analyzed: zhes bskul bas bskul bar thugs su chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun du klong bdal bar khyab ste snying rje chen po des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
translated: That great compassion pervaded the entire maṇḍala of the retinue.

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab bar mdzad nas /
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab bar mdzad nas /
translated: Having pervaded the entire maṇḍala of the retinue,🔽it pervaded the entire realm of space.🔽Having pervaded the entire realm of space,

analyzed: yang snod kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas yang bcud kyi khams kun la @428a *// khyab par mdzad do //
translated: it pervaded the entire realm of the elements.🔽Having pervaded the entire realm of the elements,

analyzed: bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas sa'i khyad par kun la khyab par mdzad do //

original: dper na / nyi ma bar snang la shar ba'i 'od kun la snyoms pa bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang stong nyid kyi ngang kun la snyoms par khyab gdal to //
analyzed: dper na / nyi ma bar snang la shar ba'i 'od kun la snyoms pa bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang stong nyid kyi ngang kun la snyoms par khyab gdal to //
translated: Just as the light of the sun shining in the sky is the same for all, so also the sun of knowledge, with the light of the sun of compassion, is all-pervading in the state of emptiness.

original: de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then, the Lord of the Secret and Supreme One, having arisen from that samadhi, entered the samadhi called The All-Illuminating Essence of Compassion in the Sky.

original: zhugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu yin no //
analyzed: zhugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu yin no //
translated: As soon as he entered, compassion pervaded everywhere, which was the power of that samadhi.

original: de nas yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa kro dhi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo //
analyzed: de nas yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa kro dhi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo //
translated: Then, the Mother Samantabhadri, the Queen of Wrathful Ones, again urged him with this song:

original: ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu khyab //
analyzed: ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu khyab //
translated: With a compassionate mind that loves like a mother, you pervade everywhere.

original: mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul 'byung gnas las //
analyzed: mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul 'byung gnas las //
translated: From the space-like opening, the source of miracles,

original: longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sku //
translated: The sambhogakaya and the nirmanakaya of compassion

original: 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol //
translated: Please show me the supreme blazing body.

original: aa la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung ste; dper na /
analyzed: aa la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung ste; dper na /
translated: By making this supplication, the Bhagavān, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, knowing that all phenomena arise in ultimate bodhicitta, emerged from the space of non-apprehension with the vajra, just as

original: zla ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang ba la shar ba bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang ba la shar ba bzhin no //
translated: the stainless moon arises in the clear sky.

original: rdo rje'i sku de las rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku de las rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni /
translated: From that vajra body, the magical light rays of awareness emanated,

original: dper na / nyi 'od kyi 'od @428b zer dus gcig shar ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na / nyi 'od kyi 'od @428b zer dus gcig shar ba lta bu'o //
translated: just as the light rays of the sun simultaneously arise.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kro dhi'i rgyal mo la gzigs te
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kro dhi'i rgyal mo la gzigs te
translated: Then, the Bhagavān, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, having arisen from samādhi, entered the samādhi called the display of the vajra method of great passion, and having entered, he gazed at the queen of wrathful mothers.

original: 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do //
analyzed: 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do //
translated: He smiles.🔽Then the Queen of Wrath, with a glance of love,🔽having bowed down to him a thousand times,

original: de nas yum kro dhi'i rgyal mos kyang spyan zim bag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan stong du brkyang phyag btsal te g-yon pa slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo //
analyzed: de nas yum kro dhi'i rgyal mos kyang spyan zim bag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan stong du brkyang phyag btsal te g-yon pa slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo //
translated: with a song of supplication on the left, she implores him:🔽Emaho!

original: ae ma'o / yid bzhin sku mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lha //
analyzed: ae ma'o / yid bzhin sku mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lha //
translated: Supreme Wish-Fulfilling Body, perfect great assembly,

original: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis gar mdzad cing //
analyzed: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis gar mdzad cing //
translated: you dance with the manner of a vajra dance,

original: dga' mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de //
analyzed: dga' mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de //
translated: and the supreme joy, the great mind of enlightenment of the vajra,

original: 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i padma'i gnas su phob ho //
analyzed: 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i padma'i gnas su phob ho //
translated: you smile and descend into the abode of the coiled lotus, ho!🔽Emaho!🔽The cloud of the white and shining mind of enlightenment,

original: ae ma'o / dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang // chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du //
analyzed: ae ma'o / dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang // chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du //
translated: and the red passion, the nature of power,

original: gnyis med 'phros pa'i byin brlabs bsam yam  las //
analyzed: gnyis med 'phros pa'i byin brlabs bsam yam  las //
translated: from the inconceivable blessing of the nondual emanation,

original: ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku bsam yas 'thon //
analyzed: ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku bsam yas 'thon //
translated: the assembly of wisdom deities, the inconceivable emanation body appears.

original: ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye //
analyzed: ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye //
translated: The blind one of the darkness of ignorance is opened by the meaning.

original: dgon dung gnas nas byang chub myu gu skyed //
analyzed: dgon dung gnas nas byang chub myu gu skyed //
translated: From the solitary place, the sprout of enlightenment grows.

original: zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slong //
analyzed: zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slong //
translated: He is roused from the state of cessation, the state of peace.

original: zhes rnam par bskul bas gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rol pas rol zhing brjid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / skum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan @429a *//
analyzed: zhes rnam par bskul bas gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rol pas rol zhing brjid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / skum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan @429a *//
translated: Thus, with a nondual display, he plays and shines forth, performing dances, smiling, casting off, contracting, swaying,

original: mdzes pa'i smin ring bskyod cing sgyur ba dang / dung gi phur bas g-yon pa slong ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'deg pa dang / rnam par 'dor pa'i rol pa'i gar gyis nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i smin ring bskyod cing sgyur ba dang / dung gi phur bas g-yon pa slong ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'deg pa dang / rnam par 'dor pa'i rol pa'i gar gyis nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
translated: and moving his beautiful long-lashed eyes. He plays with a conch-shell dagger, prodding his left side, casting off, urging on, placing, lifting up, and with dances of complete abandonment, he pervades the entire realm of space.

original: rnam par rol pa nges 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la khyab par mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam par rol pa nges 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la khyab par mdzad do //
translated: He pervades all that arises and comes into being.

original: des sems dang / sems las byung ba kun la khyab par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems zhi zhing 'khyil pas rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas snod kyi khams dang / bcud kyi khams dang / bsam gtan dang / 'gog pa dang /
analyzed: des sems dang / sems las byung ba kun la khyab par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems zhi zhing 'khyil pas rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas snod kyi khams dang / bcud kyi khams dang / bsam gtan dang / 'gog pa dang /
translated: All the elements of the world, the elements of sentient beings, the dhyānas, cessation,

original: sa'i khyad par thams cad dang / byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / stegs pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'khyud pa dang / sdom pa dang / bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / gsol ba dang / myang ba dang /
analyzed: sa'i khyad par thams cad dang / byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / stegs pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'khyud pa dang / sdom pa dang / bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / gsol ba dang / myang ba dang /
translated: and all the distinctions of the stages, the various plays of bodhicitta, the flirtations, the embraces, the union, the tight embrace, the melting, the satisfaction, the supplication, the tasting,

original: bcad pa dang / bde ba dang / sprod pa dang / 'jog pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so //
analyzed: bcad pa dang / bde ba dang / sprod pa dang / 'jog pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so //
translated: the cutting, the bliss, the insertion, the placement, and so on, are completely pervaded by the Bhagavān’s bodhicitta and remain in their own place.

original: de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang ba 'byam klas pa shar ba de las gsung gi yig 'bru 'khor lo'i tshogs su'ang snang ngo //
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang ba 'byam klas pa shar ba de las gsung gi yig 'bru 'khor lo'i tshogs su'ang snang ngo //
translated: Then, at that time, from the space of the pure mind, the light rays of awareness-awakened mind arose as an inexpressible, vast expanse, and from that, the wheels of the syllables of enlightened speech also appeared.

original: yig 'bru de nyid thugs phyag @429b mchan du'ang gyur /
analyzed: yig 'bru de nyid thugs phyag @429b mchan du'ang gyur /
translated: Those syllables also became the mudras of the mind.

original: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'du ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rgyal ba yab yum dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / thub pa dang / 'joms pa dang / 'joms ma rnams kyis skur yang rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de /
analyzed: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'du ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rgyal ba yab yum dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / thub pa dang / 'joms pa dang / 'joms ma rnams kyis skur yang rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de /
translated: The mudra of the mind's commitment radiated light and gathered in the manner of the assembly of the lord of yogins, the victors, the fathers and mothers, the male and female bodhisattvas, the male and female sages, and the male and female conquerors, who also appeared in the form of their individual commitment mudras from the light and then sat in the rows of the vajra secret, facing the lord of the supreme secret.

original: de ltar re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub bo //
analyzed: de ltar re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub bo //
translated: In this way, each of them spontaneously accomplishes the infinite retinue of buddhas and their attendants, filling the reaches of space.

original: yang 'od zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to //
analyzed: yang 'od zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to //
translated: Moreover, from each of those light rays, many assemblies of herukas also arise.

original: he ru ka re re la'ang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do //
analyzed: he ru ka re re la'ang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do //
translated: Each heruka spontaneously accomplishes a retinue of one hundred thousand buddhas and their attendants.

original: he ru ka re re las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi glog gsal bar mdzad do //
analyzed: he ru ka re re las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi glog gsal bar mdzad do //
translated: From each heruka, a rain of awareness suns is manifested, illuminating the lightning of darkness.

original: chos kyi glu dang / gar dang / chos kyi char dang / mchod pa dang / chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul yan man snrel zhi thams cad du ling long phyad do //
analyzed: chos kyi glu dang / gar dang / chos kyi char dang / mchod pa dang / chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul yan man snrel zhi thams cad du ling long phyad do //
translated: The song of dharma, dance of dharma, rain of dharma, offerings, and the amazing and marvelous dharma are all manifested in a terrifying display.

original: de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang / bdud dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing dul bar gyur to rang rang gi dbang phrogs nas sangs @430a *//
analyzed: de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang / bdud dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing dul bar gyur to rang rang gi dbang phrogs nas sangs @430a *//
translated: At that time, the light garland of Heruka subdued the Rudras, demons, rākṣasas, yakṣas, and the twenty-eight īśvarīs, who were each displaying their own great pride, and they became peaceful and disciplined.

original: rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so //
analyzed: rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so //
translated: Having taken away their own power, they became faithful to this teaching of the Buddha and gathered together.

original: de'i tshe na byang chub kyi 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang / 'gog pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de'ang dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems thob ste 'gro pa'i don byed par gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe na byang chub kyi 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang / 'gog pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de'ang dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems thob ste 'gro pa'i don byed par gyur to //
translated: At that time, the all-pervading light rays of enlightenment also empowered those who had fallen into the state of non-perception and cessation, who were like seeds burned by fire, with the water of the precious stainless bodhicitta. Having attained bodhicitta, they engaged in benefiting beings.

original: gzhan yang / sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la rab tu dad do //
analyzed: gzhan yang / sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la rab tu dad do //
translated: Furthermore, those who abide in the distinctions of the stages, having given rise to weariness with their respective stages, having stopped the activities of karma, have faith in this doctrine of the Buddha.

original: des na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag te gsol ba btab pa /
analyzed: des na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag te gsol ba btab pa /
translated: Therefore, the assembly of the retinue, having become amazed and astonished, having gathered, made a request with great fear:

original: ae ma'o ae ma ya mtshan che //
analyzed: ae ma'o ae ma ya mtshan che //
translated: Amazing! Amazing!

original: gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che //🔽'od zer 'phro 'du ya mtshan che //
analyzed: gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che // 'od zer 'phro 'du ya mtshan che //
translated: The nondual display is amazing!🔽The emanation and reabsorption of light rays is amazing!

original: byang chub char sprin ya mtshan che //🔽sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: byang chub char sprin ya mtshan che // sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
translated: The cloud of the rain of enlightenment is amazing!🔽The appearance of the buddhas is amazing!

original: sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
translated: The appearance of emanations is amazing!

original: khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
translated: The appearance of wrath is amazing!

original: byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che //🔽dgon gdungs spangs pa ya mtshan che //
analyzed: byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che // dgon gdungs spangs pa ya mtshan che //
translated: The blessing of miracles is amazing!🔽Abandoning the torment of the wilderness is amazing!

original: 'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che //
analyzed: 'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che //
translated: Reviving the cessation of the mind is amazing!

original: bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'das pa rnams //
analyzed: bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'das pa rnams //
translated: We, the retinue of the past,

original: dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzod //
analyzed: dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzod //
translated: Bless me to be one with samaya.🔽In the proper order, above and below,

original: bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod /
analyzed: bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod /
translated: I will sit in the row of the vajra secret.

original: ces gsol ba btab pas @430b bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: ces gsol ba btab pas @430b bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: With this supplication, the bhagavān, the lord of the supreme secret, entered into equipoise in the samādhi called “the vajra ornament of the retinue that is united through the nondual state of body, speech, and mind.”

original: byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po la gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po la gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do //
translated: Looking at the agent, Vajrasattva, he smiled.

original: de nas byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po des bskul bar rnam par rig nas btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi stan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar btab
analyzed: de nas byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po des bskul bar rnam par rig nas btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi stan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar btab
translated: Then, the agent, Vajrasattva, having been aroused, knowing that, united with the female consort, Samantabhadrī, he arose from his seat, placed the sign of bodhicitta in the five places,

original: nas lce padmo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste /
analyzed: nas lce padmo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste /
translated: and placed the karma vajra on the lotus of his tongue.

original: brkyang phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa /
analyzed: brkyang phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa /
translated: He made full prostrations and, with a fearless gaze, looked into the face of the teacher and requested a summary of the teaching.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongs su gsol //
translated: Lord of Secrets, father and mother, please consider this!

original: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po dgongs su gsol //
translated: Many assembled retinues, please consider this!

original: gsang mdzad ye shes klog gi 'khor lo 'di //
analyzed: gsang mdzad ye shes klog gi 'khor lo 'di //
translated: This wheel of wisdom that performs secret deeds

original: chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol //
translated: Was explained by the great Dharma king.

original: zhes gsol ba btab pas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos byed pa po kun tu bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sprin spros pas las kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram gcig lag tu
analyzed: zhes gsol ba btab pas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos byed pa po kun tu bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sprin spros pas las kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram gcig lag tu
translated: With this request, the Lord of the Supreme Secret blessed the agent Samantabhadra Vajrakarma to be the vajra master. From the space of the secret mind, he emanated a cloud of bodhicitta and placed the wheel of activity, a single vajra cross, in his hand.

original: bzhag ste / las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang las kyi sems dpa' byed pa po kun tu bzang por btags te las kyi dbang thob @431a *//🔽par gyur to //
analyzed: bzhag ste / las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang las kyi sems dpa' byed pa po kun tu bzang por btags te las kyi dbang thob @431a *//🔽par gyur to //
translated: He conferred the empowerment of activity and named him the activity bodhisattva, the agent Samantabhadra. He obtained the empowerment of activity.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lce steng du bzhag ste smra ba'i seng ge chos kyi sems dpa' zhes ming du dbang bskur he chos smra ba'i dbang thob bo //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lce steng du bzhag ste smra ba'i seng ge chos kyi sems dpa' zhes ming du dbang bskur he chos smra ba'i dbang thob bo //
translated: The Dharma wheel was placed on the tongue of the eight-petaled lotus, and the name “Lion of Speech, Bodhisattva of Dharma” was empowered.

original: de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po de btsun mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug cing spobs pa can du gyur to //
analyzed: de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po de btsun mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug cing spobs pa can du gyur to //

original: aa la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: aa la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Having uttered the sound ala la ho, he said this to the Bhagavān, the Lord of the Supreme Secret:

original: de ltar lags na /
analyzed: de ltar lags na /
translated: If it is so,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: sngags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang lags /
analyzed: sngags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang lags /
translated: what is the view of mantra?

original: lta ba dang / spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang lags /
analyzed: lta ba dang / spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang lags /
translated: What is the view and conduct?

original: spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas pa ni gang lags /
analyzed: spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas pa ni gang lags /
translated: What is the conduct alone?

original: gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord of the Supreme Secret said:

original: smra ba'i seng+ge legs so //
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge legs so //
translated: Excellent, Lion of Speech!

original: de'i don khyod nga la zhu ba ni legs so //
analyzed: de'i don khyod nga la zhu ba ni legs so //
translated: Your request to me for the meaning of that is excellent.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,

original: gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi dgongs pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi dgongs pa'i yul lo //
translated: mantra is the domain of the intention of the Tathāgatas alone.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams @434a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams @434a *//
translated: The ultimate truth of the Tathāgatas

original: kyi don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lta ga la yod de bden pa gnyis su'ang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kyi don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lta ga la yod de bden pa gnyis su'ang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is free from even the mere ultimate truth, so how could there be conventional truth? Because the two truths are inseparable.

original: lta ba dang / spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni /
analyzed: lta ba dang / spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni /
translated: The mind is fixed on the view and on conduct.🔽

original: rnal 'byor pas thob pa dang / sa la bsnyen pa rnams te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas thob pa dang / sa la bsnyen pa rnams te /
translated: The yogis who have attained and are approaching the stages are those whose minds are set on the view and on conduct.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: rnal 'byor blo mnyam pa nyid du blo chung ba rnams la ni bden pa rnams pa gnyis kyi tshul yod de don dam par ma skyes pa'i tshul du blo chud pa dang / kun rdzob tu mtshan ma thabs kyi phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du'ang med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor blo mnyam pa nyid du blo chung ba rnams la ni bden pa rnams pa gnyis kyi tshul yod de don dam par ma skyes pa'i tshul du blo chud pa dang / kun rdzob tu mtshan ma thabs kyi phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du'ang med pa ma yin te /
translated: The yogis who are of equal mind have two kinds of truths: they have a mind that is absorbed in the way of ultimate non-arising, and they are not without the way of relative illusory seals of the method of signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they have both the yoga of signlessness and the yoga of signs.

original: slob pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bden pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pa che chung gis 'grub ba yin no //
analyzed: slob pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bden pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pa che chung gis 'grub ba yin no //
translated: That training yoga is accomplished by the great and small familiarization with the stage of effortless activity, based on the two kinds of truths.

original: sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor don las ring du gyur pa rnams ni spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas te /
analyzed: sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor don las ring du gyur pa rnams ni spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas te /
translated: The yogis who follow words and are far from the meaning are those whose minds are set on conduct alone.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: log pa'i kun rdzob 'ba' zhig la rtog gi /
analyzed: log pa'i kun rdzob 'ba' zhig la rtog gi /
translated: They only imagine the false relative.

original: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because they do not see the divine maṇḍala of the correct relative,

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,

original: de bas na log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo lta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang / lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo lta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang / lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad shes par bya'o //
translated: therefore, based on the phenomena of the false relative, like ordinary beings, the correct relative truth should be known as the maṇḍala of the deities and goddesses.

original: @434b yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grags so //
analyzed: @434b yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grags so //
translated: One who is able to comprehend the ultimate truth based on the correct relative truth is renowned as a ‘person of knowledge.’

original: smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa bo rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa bo rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa /
translated: Vajra Samantabhadra, the Lion of Speech, made a request:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Bhagavān,

original: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i rang bzhin gang lags /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i rang bzhin gang lags /
translated: what is the nature of the conduct of secret mantra?

original: dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lags /
analyzed: dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lags /
translated: How is it described with analogies?”

original: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, replied:

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: “Lion of Speech,

original: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /
translated: Listen to me, I will explain the way of the mantra conduct.

original: ngas yid tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: ngas yid tshim par bya'o //
translated: I will satisfy your mind.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,

original: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
translated: the conduct of mantra is inconceivable,

original: rab tu brjod par dka' na mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcur 'dus so //
analyzed: rab tu brjod par dka' na mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcur 'dus so //
translated: and if it is difficult to express, in brief it is included in ten aspects.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang / gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang / gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang / gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang / gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang /
translated: The accomplishment of mantra, the particular name of mantra, the conduct of mantra, the power of mantra, the place of accomplishment of mantra, the repetition of mantra, the seal of mantra,

original: gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang / gsang sngags kyi cho 'phrul lo //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang / gsang sngags kyi cho 'phrul lo //
translated: the samadhi of mantra, the view of mantra, and the miracle of mantra.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,

original: de dag gi dper brjod pa'ang rnam pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de dag gi dper brjod pa'ang rnam pa bcu ste /
translated: there are also ten examples of those.

original: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / brag cha dang / @435a *//
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / brag cha dang / @435a *//
translated: They appear as illusions, mirages, dreams, reflections, cities of gandharvas, echoes,

original: chu zla dang / chu'i chu bur dang / mig 'khrul dang / mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo //
analyzed: chu zla dang / chu'i chu bur dang / mig 'khrul dang / mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo //
translated: water-moons, water bubbles, optical illusions, and whirling firebrands.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,

original: de'ang ji lta zhe na /🔽sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / sman dang / sbyor sngags kyi sbyor ba las /
analyzed: de'ang ji lta zhe na / sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / sman dang / sbyor sngags kyi sbyor ba las /
translated: how is that?🔽The defining characteristic of an illusion is that it appears in any way whatsoever, captivating the mind, through the application of a person’s effort, medicine, and mantra application.

original: dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang slu pa'i bdag nyid can de snang ba med do //
analyzed: dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang slu pa'i bdag nyid can de snang ba med do //
translated: However, it is not that the nature of deception does not appear.

original: de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang / yig 'bru dang / rdzas kyi sbyor pa las grub pa'i rtags dag snang yang de la rang bzhin med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang / yig 'bru dang / rdzas kyi sbyor pa las grub pa'i rtags dag snang yang de la rang bzhin med do //
translated: In the same way, the defining characteristic of the accomplishment of mantra is that the signs of accomplishment appear from the application of samādhi, syllables, and the application of substances, but they are without intrinsic nature.

original: smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu la chur mthong yang de la chu'i rang bzhin med do //
analyzed: smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu la chur mthong yang de la chu'i rang bzhin med do //
translated: The defining characteristic of a mirage is that when the sun is warm and people are tormented by thirst, they see a mirage as water, but it has no nature as water.

original: de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang / tha snyad btags pa'ang ming nyid dmigs su ga la yod /
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang / tha snyad btags pa'ang ming nyid dmigs su ga la yod /
translated: In the same way, the special name of a mantra is a name imputed to a nonexistent basis of imputation, and how could a mere name that is a conventional designation be observed?

original: rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do //
translated: The defining characteristic of a dream is that when a person is asleep, many aspects of happiness and suffering are dreamed, but when they wake up, nothing is observed.

original: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'ang ji ltar spyad na'ang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'ang ji ltar spyad na'ang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo //
translated: In the same way, the conduct of mantra is also free from all observed objects of conduct, no matter how it is practiced.

original: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu 'am /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu 'am /
translated: The defining characteristic of a reflection is that a face appears as a reflection based on water,

original: me @435b long ngam /
analyzed: me @435b long ngam /
translated: a mirror,

original: 'bru mar la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs su snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do //
analyzed: 'bru mar la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs su snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do //
translated: or oil, but the face does not move there.

original: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo //
translated: Likewise, the accomplishments of mantra also arise in dependence on practice, meditative concentration, and requisites, but they are free from reference points.

original: dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang na gnas pa der grong khyer yang de na gnas te de byung ma thag tu rtag pa ma yin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'byung la /
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang na gnas pa der grong khyer yang de na gnas te de byung ma thag tu rtag pa ma yin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'byung la /
translated: The defining characteristic of a gandharva city is that wherever gandharvas dwell, a city also dwells there. As soon as it arises, it is not permanent, and the abode of mantra also arises from the generation of the yogin himself.

original: de yang ther zug ma yin no; ;brag ca zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni brag ca ngos la sgra ji skad skyen pa skang brag ca la'ang de bzhin du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de yang ther zug ma yin no; ;brag ca zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni brag ca ngos la sgra ji skad skyen pa skang brag ca la'ang de bzhin du 'byung ngo //
translated: Moreover, it is not stable. The defining characteristic of an echo is that a sound arises on the face of a cliff just as it is produced, and it also arises in an echo.

original: 'byung yang sgrar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'i sgra'ang bzlas pa tsam nyid na stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung yang sgrar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'i sgra'ang bzlas pa tsam nyid na stong pa'o //
translated: Even though it arises, the sound is not observed. Likewise, the sound of mantra recitation is empty just as soon as it is recited.

original: chu zla zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du snang yang chu la zla ba med do //
analyzed: chu zla zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du snang yang chu la zla ba med do //
translated: The definition of “moon in water” is that the reflection of the moon appears in the water, but there is no moon in the water.

original: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la'ang gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la'ang gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, in the maṇḍala of the seal, there is no concept of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: chu'i chu bur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang 'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa'ang gcig tu ma chad do //
analyzed: chu'i chu bur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang 'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa'ang gcig tu ma chad do //
translated: The definition of “water bubble” is that many bubbles arise from a single great wave of water and then re-converge. Likewise, the aspect of the samādhi of the yogin is not interrupted as one.

original: mig 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig nad can gyis bar snang la bltas @436a *//
analyzed: mig 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig nad can gyis bar snang la bltas @436a *//
translated: The definition of “eye disorder” is that when the eyes of a person with an eye disease look at the sky,

original: na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do //
analyzed: na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do //
translated: two moons appear, but the moon does not become two.

original: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba'ang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam mang yongs su grub par yongs su mi blta'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba'ang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam mang yongs su grub par yongs su mi blta'o //
translated: Likewise, the view of secret mantra should not be viewed as the many conceptual thoughts of the view of the concept of grasping.

original: mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag lag na mgal me thogs nas bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste; de la dbyibs med do //
analyzed: mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag lag na mgal me thogs nas bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste; de la dbyibs med do //
translated: The characteristic of what is called a whirling firebrand is that when someone holding a firebrand in their hand whirls it around, it appears in any shape at all, but it has no shape.

original: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos por ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos por ma grub pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the magical display of the yogin’s mind appears and arises as anything at all, but is not established as a thing.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,🔽🔽

original: de ltar na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, Mādhuvaṇṭa, the conduct of mantra should be understood in this way.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge /
translated: Lion of Speech,🔽🔽

original: de ltar bas na rnal 'byor pas yang dag par kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bas na rnal 'byor pas yang dag par kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Mādhuvaṇṭa, therefore, the yogin should realize ultimate truth in dependence on the correct relative truth.

original: 'phags pa rgyud gyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: 'phags pa rgyud gyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the noble Sūtra of the Tantra King, the Wheel of Time,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
translated: this completes the second chapter, which explains the introduction through the stages of samādhi and the conduct of mantra.

original: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun tu rab tu
analyzed: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun tu rab tu
translated: Then, the speaker Siṃha, the all-good creator, circumambulated the Bhagavān, King of the Supreme Secret, a hundred thousand times, and made vast, marvelous offerings with suchness itself.

original: mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te @436b 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te @436b 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Having made offerings in every way, he bowed his head and made prostrations in the yogic style and made this request:

original: ae ma'o bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang //
analyzed: ae ma'o bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang //
translated: “Amazing! Sugata, all-good!

original: ae ma'o ye nas dag pa'i don //
analyzed: ae ma'o ye nas dag pa'i don //
translated: Amazing! The meaning of primordial purity!

original: ae ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag /
analyzed: ae ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag /
translated: Amazing! Lord of the supreme secret!

original: ae ma'o ye shes rngam pa'i glog /🔽ae ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po //
analyzed: ae ma'o ye shes rngam pa'i glog / ae ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po //
translated: Amazing! The lightning of wrathful wisdom!🔽Amazing! The great bliss of nonduality!

original: ae ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog /
analyzed: ae ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog /
translated: Amazing! The supreme bliss of great bliss!
